## Version 0.1.1

---

Released 2024-12-03

- added docstrings for relevant classes and methods.
- rename `ORMStore` to `SQLORMStore`.
- rename `ORMTrafficMixin` to `SQLORMModelMixin`.


## Version 0.1.0

---

Released 2024-12-03

- Alpha release.
- Stores: `JSONStore`, `CSVStore`, `SQLStore`, `ORMStore`.


## Version 0.0.1

---

Released 2024-12-01

- Initial release.
